body:
Comment 10: 
According to "go version" you are still using "go version go1.1.1 windows/amd64". I
suspect old go command is in your PATH ("echo %PATH%" to see which directory it is in).
You should remove it form your PATH and all other GO... variables you might have and
install Go from source as I suggested earlier http://golang.org/doc/install/source. If
you have trouble following instructions or some of these steps fail for you just tell us
here and we will help.

Alex
